Within the last eight years, at least 10 administrators have resigned in part due to a toxic workplace culture, employees said.

The director of finance and administration has changed three times since 2015. As of the most recent resignation in 2022, there has been no interim leader and the position has yet to be filled.

Each circle denotes

a resignation.

Director of finance and administration

Director of Morningside operations

Director of security technology projects

Director of Manhattanville operations

Executive director of CUIMC operations

Assistant director of administration and planning

2017

2020

2022

2019

2021

2015

2016

2018

Graphic by Laya Gollamudi
